document_data.name: Blood Fortress
document_data.mainbody: The '''Blood Fortress''' was the most prominent temple dedicated to [[Anhur]], the General of the Gods within the [[Mulhorandi pantheon]].
document_data.Location: The Blood Fortress was located in the coastal city of [[Sultim]] in northern [[Mulhorand]].
document_data.Description: The entire massive structure was made from [[granite]]. Seven deep red obelisk towers surrounded the temple. Most of the interior walls were decorated with frescoes depicting ancient battles or strategic maps. The halls were lined with weapons and [[armor]], as well as forbidding statues, many of which could be animated for defensive purposes.
